utils.crypto

Class Crypto

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.crypto.Crypto

  • public class Crypto
extends java.lang.Object
    Class contains static methods to generate and validate salt and digest values for a given password using the lambdaworks crypto library SCrypt.
    Author:
    cbi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Crypto() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String computeScryptHash(java.lang.String password, java.lang.String saltBase64)
      Computes the scrypt hash based on the provided password and salt values.
      static java.lang.String createScryptHash(java.lang.String password)
      Creates an scrypt hash (containing salt and scrypt and check values) based on the provided password.
      static Digest generateDigest(java.lang.String password)
      Generates a Digest object with salt and scrypt values based on the provided password.
      static boolean isPasswordValid(java.lang.String password, Digest digest)
      Computes the scrypt hash with the provided password and the salt value comming from the provided Digest object and compares it with the scrypt hash comming from the same Digest object.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main method accepts password from commandline, generates salt and scrypt hashes out of it and prints them to the sysout.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • createScryptHash

        public static java.lang.String createScryptHash(java.lang.String password)
        Creates an scrypt hash (containing salt and scrypt and check values) based on the provided password.
        Parameters:
        password - password String to scrypt
        Returns:
        encrypted password string

      • generateDigest

        public static Digest generateDigest(java.lang.String password)
        Generates a Digest object with salt and scrypt values based on the provided password.
        Parameters:
        password - password string
        Returns:
        Digest object

      • computeScryptHash

        public static java.lang.String computeScryptHash(java.lang.String password,
                                                 java.lang.String saltBase64)
                                          throws java.security.GeneralSecurityException
        Computes the scrypt hash based on the provided password and salt values.
        Parameters:
        password - password string
        saltBase64 - Base64 encoded Salt value string
        Returns:
        Scrypt Hash
        Throws:
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException - if decoding has failed

      • isPasswordValid

        public static boolean isPasswordValid(java.lang.String password,
                                      Digest digest)
                               throws java.security.GeneralSecurityException
        Computes the scrypt hash with the provided password and the salt value comming from the provided Digest object and compares it with the scrypt hash comming from the same Digest object.
        Parameters:
        password - password string
        digest - Digest object
        Returns:
        password valid or not
        Throws:
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException - if decoding or encoding has failed

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Main method accepts password from commandline, generates salt and scrypt hashes out of it and prints them to the sysout.
        Parameters:
        args - commandline inputs
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - all exceptions to the console
